SavePower.NAME: Focus
SavePower.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Your next attack card deals !M! extra damage.

Printf.NAME: Examplary
Printf.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL add a *Focus into your hand.

Brilliance_N.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.

Practice_Cooking.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Permanently increase healing by 1. NL Exhaust.

More_Amazonian.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL  NL Increase this card's damage times by !M! this combat.

Fearless_Of_Death.NAME: Fearless Of Death

Fearless_Of_Death.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Attack card, draw !M! card. NL At the start of your turn，lose 5 HP.(tips:Losing HP does not stack up).

The_Last_Bullets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Decrease this card's damage times by 1 this combat.

Magic_Block.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 3 lose-memory. NL Gain !M! Artifact.

Scarborough_Fair.NAME: Scarborough Fair

Thyme_N.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain fearless Power. NL Gain !M! lose-memory. NL Exhaust.

illusion_Body.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an Skill card. Add 2 copies of that card into your hand.

Relive_N.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL raise your Max HP by half of your lose-memory. NL Exhaust.

Sword_LPT.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You will not gain lose-memory this combat. NL But you can gain Gold. NL Ethereal.

Selfless_N.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL Gain 3 lose-memory.

Redemption_N.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose cards to Exhaust in your hand. NL Gain 1 lose-memory for each card Exhausted. NL Exhaust.

Emergency_Cooking.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] . NL heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

Alert_N.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Deals additional damage equal to lose-memory's amount.

Experience_N.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard your hand. NL Put !M! card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
